00000002 ; patadr, pattern address decimal 0
00000042 ; 0x21 << 1
00000000
00000000
00000004 ; patclk, 0, redundant
00000040 ; 0x20 << 1
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000002 ; BIAS ON 
0000000C ; 0x06 << 1
00000001
00000003
00000004 ; patclk, 100 ticks out(10us after BIAS)
00000040 ; 0x20 << 1
00000064
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000008 ; pulse, no meas
0000000A ; 0x5 << 1
00000001
000000C8 ; width, 100ns ticks, 20us(200 ticks)
00000000 
00000000
00000000 ; no meas flag
00000001 ; meas offset
00000000
00000000
00000004 ; next, end pattern, patctl
00000044 ; 0x22 << 1 
00000010 ; PTN_END bit, d4
00000000
00000000 ; pattern starting address, not really necessary
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
